participants.name: Cheryl McCoy, MBA
participants.title: Managing Director, Interaction Strategy & Support at Charles Schwab

messages.message:
Let me know if we have any common / shared goals or interests I can help you with. 

All the best! 
Cheryl
How do you interact strategically when people can't be honest?

Not sure where this is coming from, but you don't. You have to find partners who you trust to build a strategic partnership. It's rare to find these days when everyone is about making the next dollar instead of building long term relationships. Hope that helps!
Brilliantly articulated. As a consultant, I trust to build trust quickly to save people a lot of stress.
